LanguageData.MFM_MedievalHireRentDesc: Hire or rent mercenaries with the Iron Alliance
LanguageData.MFM_DialogUnavailableOnSOS2Rimnauts2Map: (Unavailable on SOS2 or Rimnauts2 space maps)
LanguageData.MFM_GuardModeDesc: Allows the unit to be assigned automatically on guardspot
LanguageData.MFM_GuardSpotAffectGuardDesc: Reserve a guard on this guard spot
LanguageData.MFM_FiredDesc: Allows you to end the contract of this mercenary before the end of the quadrum. Be careful, as in this case the {0} will keep your guarantee because you do not respect the contract.
LanguageData.MFM_GuardAttackOnlyNearThreatsDesc: If enabled, this allows you to specify which bodyguards are supposed to attack only very close threats.
LanguageData.MFM_GuardStopAllDesc: Allows you to stop all bodyguards from protecting this unit.
LanguageData.MFM_GuardStopDesc: Allows you to stop the bodyguard from protecting this unit.
LanguageData.MFM_GuardDesc: Allows you to specify to the mercenary which unit to protect. This will make them follow and protect the unit.
LanguageData.MFM_DialogConfirmFiredDesc: Would you really like to fire this mercenary? His guarantee will be retained by the {0}.
LanguageData.MFM_DialogConfirmPowerBeamDesc: Launching the orbital beam from a USFM satellite orbiting your planet on the selected coordinate will cost you {0} silver and take 10 seconds to reach the target, do you confirm the operation?
LanguageData.MFM_DialogConfirmCancelBillDesc: Warning! By refusing to pay the bill, all your current contracts with the {0} will be canceled (both hired mercenaries and those rented). Would you like to confirm?
LanguageData.MFM_ChoiceLetterCounterOffer: A faction has made an advantageous salary of {0} silver for your mercenaries to attack your colony. Some of your mercenaries may accept their offer, but some some may turn against you because of this. They require you to pay them {1} silver (transferred directly to their USFM account) to stay on your side and possibly avoid this attack. You have {2} hours to pay.
LanguageData.MFM_GuaranteeLineNOK: {0} for the guarantee of {1} ( {2} - {3} because of his injuries)
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedMercDelivery: The ordered mercenaries will arrive in {0}.
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedMercDeliveryDesc: The ordered mercenaries will arrive by end of the deadline.
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedMercReturn: The return of the rented colonists arrive in {0}.
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedMercReturnDesc: The contract of some of your mercenaries have ended and they will return to your colony at the end of the set time.
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedDeliveryStuffAndGuarante: The delivery of guarantees and mercenaries equipment arrives in {0}.
Following an end of your contract, the {0} will restore you (if any) the equipment owned or worn by the mercenaries before they left.
LanguageData.MFM_AlertPlannedMedievalCaravanDeliveryD: A delivery caravan from the Iron Alliance is on its way to deliver goods/money
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercArrivalDesc: One of more settlers that you rented to the {0} are returning to your colony.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterUSFMRenewStockDesc: The {0} have just renewed its mercenary troops. Do not hesitate to go see their new offers.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterDepositRecoveryDesc: {0} items and gear have been returned plus the following guarantees following the end of {1} mercenaries contract: {2}Total : {3}.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercInjuredDesc: The contract of {0} has been canceled due to an injury ({1} missing).
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercDeathDesc: We are sad to announce to you that {0} has died during his service today{1}
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercDeathDescComp: , his corpse will be sent back to you.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercEarnMoneyDesc: Following a successful raid against a base, {0} earned a bonus salary ({1}) that he sends you through the {2}.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterMercRaidDesc: {0} paid a high price for a {1} mercenary squad to annihilate you.{2}
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedMercPaidDesc: Receipt of a payment of {0} silver from the {1} corresponding to the activity income of your hired mercenaries.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterMercFiredDesc: {0} misbehaved in one of his assignments with a client of the {1} as he showed insolence and improper behavior regarding his colleague. He was therefore fired and cannot be hired again as mercenary for a while.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterMercSalaryIncreaseRejectedDesc: Following your refusal to accept the salary increase requested by your mercenaries following the proposed counter offer, {0} of them joined the camp of the faction {1} and will now attack you
LanguageData.MFM_ChoiceLetterMercWantJoinTitle: A Mercenary Wants To Join Your Colony
LanguageData.MFM_ChoiceLetterMercWantJoin: {0} wishes to join your colony, however the regulation of the {1} stipulates that to be able to recruit one of their mercenaries, you have to pay {2} times his salary ( {3}) pay a total of {4}.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterFirstDiscount: Dear customer, for your first mercenary order, get a discount of -{0}% using the promotional code: {1}.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterDiscountDesc: Dear customer, for your next mercenary order, get a discount of -{0}% using the promotional code: {1}.
LanguageData.MFM_DiscountCodeWarning: Please note this code it will not be re-communicated.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterMercPartRemovingExplosionDesc: The Autonomous Remote Supervision System (A.R.S.S) of the USFM (thanks to a chip implanted in all organs of mercenaries) has detected an attempt to steal one of the organs and triggered the self-destruction mechanism of the implanted chip.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterArrivedMedievalCaravanDelivery: Arrival of the caravan bringing you the salary of your mercenaries currently rented for the current quadrum
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedSlaveMercEscapeDesc: Your rented slave mercenaries {0} engaged as {1} took advantage of his mission to escape. As stipulated in the terms of the contract, the {2} will undemrain you from this loss by paying you 2 times his salary.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterRentedSlaveMercFactionRelation: The faction {0} realized during a mission of your mercenaries at home after talking with {1}, that you practice slavery, that goes against their ethical principles, consequently it will degrade the relations that they have with you.
LanguageData.MFM_LetterImprisonedMercPaymentDesc: Receipt of a payment of {0} silver from the {1} corresponding to the release of imprisoned mercenaries.
LanguageData.MFM_MsgCannotBeRentedAsMercBecauseBadHea: {0} cannot be rented as mercenary, either because he cannot walk (downed) or its state of health is not good enough for the service
LanguageData.MFM_MsgPawnCannotBeRentedAsMerc: {0} cannot be rented as mercenary, either because he cannot fight either because he possesses a trait incompatible with this job (pyromaniac, nudist, etc..)
LanguageData.MFM_MsgPawnBeRentedAsMercInvalidType: {0} cannot do this job because he is incapable !
LanguageData.MFM_MsgCannotBeRentedAsMercBecauseFired: {0} was fired by the {1} for his bad behavior, he can be rehired in {2}.
LanguageData.MFM_MsgNotEnoughtSilverPowerBeam: Operation canceled as you do not have enough money to launch the orbital beam.
LanguageData.MFM_MsgCannotDropWeaponDuringCounterOffe: {0} dont want to drop/equip weapons/gears ( counter-offer incident ongoing)
LanguageData.MFM_MsgPawnCannotBeRentedAsMerc2: {0} cannot be rented as mercenary, because he possesses a trait incompatible with this job (pyromaniac, nudist, etc..)
LanguageData.MFM_MsgMissingJobOnSomeColonistToRent: Job missing on some of the selected colonists
LanguageData.MFM_MsgToPayBillNeedCaravanOnSiteOfPayme: To pay the bill you must have a caravan positioned on a payment point with the necessary money.
LanguageData.MFM_NeedSilverInCaravanPayBill: Not enough money in the caravan placed on the payment point, you must have {0} to pay the bill
LanguageData.MFM_MsgNeedSelectMercToContinue: You need to choose at least one mercenary to continue
LanguageData.MFM_MsgMustHaveTraitInBlacklistedTraits: Must have trait {0} deleted, because it's present in blacklisted traits too !
LanguageData.MFM_MsgPawnCannotBeRentedAsMercBecauseMi: {0} cannot be rented as mercenary because he/she does not possess the "must have trait" {0}
LanguageData.MFM_Gear0: No Gear (free, Basic USFM Shirt + Simple Pants)
LanguageData.MFM_Gear3: Advanced (cost {0} : Marine Armor + Power Armor Helmet)
LanguageData.MFM_Weapon2: Standard (cost {0} : Heavy SMG/Chain Shotgun OR Gladius)
LanguageData.MFM_Weapon3: Advanced (cost {0} : Assault Rifle/Charge Rifle/Sniper OR Longsword)
LanguageData.MFM_Weapon4: Apocalyptic (cost {0} : Triple Rocket/Doomsday Rocket Launcher OR Thrumbo Horn)
LanguageData.MFM_Gear1Medieval: Basic (cost {0} : Shirt + Simple Pants + War mask)
LanguageData.MFM_Gear2Medieval: Standard (cost {0} : Parka + Simple Pants + Simple Helmet)
LanguageData.MFM_QuickDelivery: Quick Delivery (cost {0} per mercenary, delivery between {1}h and {2}h)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsSectionBlacklistedPawnKind: PawnKind (defName) not allowed for the mercenary generation
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsSectionHediffToKeepOnMercGen: Hediff (defName) to keep on the mercenary generation
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsSectionBlacklistedWeapons: Weapons (defName) not allowed for the mercenary generation
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsDisableNotifWhenDisusedMercD: Disable notification when disused mercenaries are killed
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsPercentDisusedMercCanDiePerQ: Percentage of disused mercenaries that can be killed at each beginning of quadrum ({0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsTimeBeforeRenewOffers: Time Before the USFM Renew These Offers ({0})
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsBadMoodNbhPerQuadFloor: Number of hours in a quadrum during which mercenaries are in a bad mood to impact the monthly cost ({0}h)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsGoodMoodNbhPerQuadFloor: Number of hours in a quadrum during which the mercenaries are in a good mood to impact the monthly cost ({0}h)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsBadMoodCoefIncCost: Coefficient of increase of the monthly cost in case of ceiling of bad mood reached ({0}%}
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsGoodMoodCoefDecCost: Coefficient of decrease of the monthly cost in case of ceiling of bad mood reached ({0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsStuffAndGuaranteeDeliveryTim: Minimum time to deliver stuff and guarantee ({0}h)
Maximum time to deliver stuff and guarantee ({0}h)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsUseOnlyVanillaForWeapon: Only use vanilla weapons for mercenaries
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsUseOnlyVanillaForGear: Only use vanilla gears for mercenaries
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsUSFMSuspendedMinTime: Minimum suspended time from the USFM ({0})
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsUSFMSuspendedMaxTime: Maximum suspended time from the USFM ({0})
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsPowerBeamCost: Cost of launching an orbital beam
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsMercJoinNbSalary: mercenary wants to join the colony: Number of times to pay his salary ({0})
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsIncidentsCounterOfferMinPric: Minimum rate for the salary increase request ({0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsIncidentsCounterOfferMaxPric: Maximum rate for the salary increase request ({0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsRiskRemovedCyborgPartExplode: Risk that the removal of a bionic limb belonging to the USFM will cause an explosion ({0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsMinXPGainPerDayRentedMerc: Minimum XP earned per day for rented mercenaries
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsMaxXPGainPerDayRentedMerc: Maximum XP earned per day for rented mercenaries
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsAllowNonViolentToBeRent: Allow non violent colonist to be rented to the USFM
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsMedievalModeDeliveryCaravanM: Minimum arrival time of a delivery caravan ({0}h)
Maximum arrival time of a delivery caravan ({0}h)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsCurrentEpochModernOnly: Modern only (will remove the Iron Alliance)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsPreventNonMercSpawnWithUSFMS: Prevent non mercenaries pawn to spawn with USFM stuff
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsSalaryDecreaseRateAppliedToR: Normal percentage of decrease applied to rented mercenaries (-{0}%)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsBuyMercSalaryMultiplier: Multiplier of salary to apply when the player wants to buy the mercenaries (x{0})
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsAllowMercNonZeroOtherSkills: Allow mercenaries to have their other skills not zero (will always be lower than the main skill)
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsImprisonedMercenariesAreNoLo: Mercenaries arrested are no longer considered as mercenary
LanguageData.MFM_SettingsSetBasicWorkTypeToOne: Set basic worktype priorities of hired mercenaries to 1 (Firefighter, patient, PatientBedRest)
